item.title: BE
item.description: score:110 Chances: Bloom Energy has seen solid earnings estimate revision activity over the past month. One analyst believes that powering data centers will help the company charge higher. The demand for better environmental tech continues to ramp up. Investors watching artificial intelligence are turning to power plant companies, which could benefit Bloom Energy.
